org.xchain.framework.digester

Class ExtendedDigester

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.apache.commons.digester.Digester
        • org.xchain.framework.digester.ExtendedDigester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler

    public class ExtendedDigester
extends org.apache.commons.digester.Digester
implements org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler
    A digester that has been extended to pass along LexicalHandler events to a custom lexical handler, if it is set.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble
